item.title: Hard Life
item.description:
A girl is fighting for her place in a hostile world, against overwhelming odds. Without help, she'll be lost.
I made this as a "quickshot" adventure, set in the world of the "Blue Planet" game by Biohazard. Character sheets have been provided for the first edition of the game, however "Blue Planet" has since been republished by Fantasy Flight games with new rules.
The scenario contains hints at child abuse, use this at your own discretion.

item.title: Peaceful Relations
item.description:
Remote farms are ruthlessly attacked by unknown raiders. Can the slaughter be stopped before an open war breaks out.
These are notes and character descriptions for an adventure that I run as part of a "Deadlands - Lost Colony" game. The scenario could be adapted to almost any wild west/outback setting.

item.title: Feng Shui Characters
item.description: A collection of character descriptions I made up for a "Feng Shui" campaign.

item.title: Feng Shui Snippets - The mysterious plans of Dr. Shon-Goo
item.description: A series of notes and plot ideas I made for a "Feng Shui" campaign. Can the players stop Evil Overlord Dr. Shon-Goo from taking over the world?
item.link: PDF and Latex sources in one .zip file

item.title: Feng Shui equipment list
item.description: A few nifty new items (guns and cars) for use with the "Feng Shui" roleplaying game.

item.title: A history of the Dark Ages
item.description: A short timeline of events in medieval Europe. I made this for a "Vampire" campaign, but it's all "real" stuff and may be used for any game. No warranties for historical correctness, though...

item.title: gameXF - a roleplaying XML format
item.description:
This was an attempt to create a generic XML format to store roleplaying information. The package contains an XML schema, XSL Transformation stylesheets and sample data (character descriptions from a "Feng Shui" and an "Unknown Armies" campaign). I doubt that this project will go any further, but you may use the ideas if you like.
You'll need an XSLT engine to do the stylesheet transformations.

item.title: LIRP-Zubehör (German language)
item.description: Dies sind "Charakterbögen" für ein LIRP (Life Indoor Roleplaying Game) das wir auf einer Party durchgeführt haben. Jeder Gast erhielt einen solchen Zettel als Characterbeschreibung. Leider habe ich keine Aufschrieb des "Drumherums" und der restlichen Charactere mehr.
